name: WP URLs Shortener 2015 + Social icons + Analytics[goo.gl]
author: Khubbaib

sections.description:
WP shortify – Shortify allows you to track, in real-time, the clicks and referrers on any shortened URL – a perfect tool to help you understand what appeals to your audience and to help you optimize your social, email, and other click-through Within WordPress.

You can read the guide here for adding your google client information.

[PRO Version] Would you like to see new features? Email me at khubbaib@gmail.com.

Features:

  • Generate Short URL with goo.gl when you add any post.
  • View short URL, Status,Created date,QR for every post
  • Country wise Stats.
  • Referrer Stats (which site referrer and how many clicks).
  • All time clicks,Monthly clicks,weekly Clicks,Daily clicks and last two hours clicks.
  • Browser stats with clicks.
  • Plateform Stats with clicks.
  • Styled with Bootstrap.
  • Share link under edit post,front end, dashboard to share more and more.
  • Exclude any post.
  • Set custom post types for creating short URL
  • One click Shor URL generating i-e you have 200 posts and want to create short url for all go to dashboard and click to create.

Live preview

Live preview

  • Username : demo
  • Password : demo

Donation

You may buy the premium version to support the development.

http://khubbaib.com/
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

1) Install

Modern Way:

  1. Go to the WordPress Dashboard “Add New Plugin” section.
  2. Search For “WP URLs Shortener 2015”.
  3. Install, then Activate it.

Old Way:

  1. Unzip (if it is zipped) and Upload wp-shortify folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress

2) Configure

  1. Reach out to the shortify-> Settings Page
  2. Connect with google and paste the code and save it.
sections.faq:
Why connect with google?

This plugin generate the url with goo.gl so you must be connect with google to generate and track the url stats.
